name: DOCUSIGN FRANCE
goal: DocuSign France is a Qualified Trust Service Provider (under eIDAS Regulation). DocuSign France offers trust services such as electronic signatures to business customers in various industries, in order to help them to transform their paper processes to fully digital processes.
interests: Banking and financial services, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: DocuSign France participates to standardization groups at ETSI and CEN in the context of eIDAS Regulation. DocuSign France also closely follows expert groups in the domains of electronic identification and GDPR.
